main.description: Like [com.atproto.identity.resolveIdentity](https://docs.bsky.app/docs/api/com-atproto-identity-resolve-identity) but instead of the full `didDoc` it returns an atproto-relevant subset.

did.description: DID, bi-directionally verified if a handle was provided in the query.

handle.description:
The validated handle of the account or `handle.invalid` if the handle
did not bi-directionally match the DID document.

signing_key.description:
The atproto signing key publicKeyMultibase

Legacy key encoding not supported. the key is returned directly; `id`,
`type`, and `controller` are omitted.
